label: Description
value: Louis XV armchair with back, seat and top of arms upholstered in red-to-blue Aubusson tapestry with floral design; domed metal tacks along edges of fabric; carved scrolling and floral decoration at center front of seat rail, knees, feet, and arms.

label: Description
value: Fragment of mordant-painted and dyed cotton with a Pious Pelican piercing her breast with drops of blood flowing out to three young birds which fly up from the ground below in a row.  Mother pelican is standing on a four-mound.  Leaves and flowers of other motifs on the edges of the fragment.  Colors: red, blue, yellow (faded), dark red.  Outline: black-brown on an ivory background.

label: Physical description
value: Medium: cotton Technique: mordant and resist painted, immersion dyed (chintz) on plain weave

label: Description
value: Fragment in olive green, red, yellow and off-white patterned by a row of a motif of two large flowers with a bunch of leaves in alternate alignment with a row of a motif of two large leaves with a branch of smaller leaves, scrolling tendrils between the motifs with small flower sprigs. Subtle background patterning of a diamond lattice.

label: Description
value: Blue and brown gingham check (formed when alternating blue and brown stripes in both the warp and weft intersect to give solid blue, solid brown, and a blue/brown mixed shade.)

label: Dimensions
value: Warp x Weft: 24.1 x 30.5 cm (9 1/2 x 12 in.)

label: Description
value: a) Corinthian columns support alternatively large and small arches. An urn on pedestal beneath each of smaller arches. In larger arches: Concave colonade of doric columns topped by statue of Britannia, facing right holding spear, resting on shield. Apparently a copy of 1970-26-2; in the printing, the pattern was reversed; b,c) Stamped in an oval on verso: -b2X "___lls & Co./HARTFORD".

label: Provenance
value: Removed from the walls of a house in Haddam, Connecticut.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Large central bouquet, with remaining colors of green and white. Printed on blue ground, mounted on board.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Tile pattern, series of floral sprigs in alternate, printed in shades of blue on white.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Imitation wood wainscoting, showing two alternating inset panels: one large and one small, against gray ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Landscape scenes set within an elaborate frame in the Rococo or Renaissance style. a) shows a bridge and tower, while b) shows a large ship in a harbor. The scenes are printed in color and the framework, vases and flowering vines are in grisaille.

label: Physical description
value: Block printed on paper, masonite support

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Shades of brown and white architectural vistas, window, etc., with two scenes alternating. Based on style of pillar and arch designs.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Rococo Revival style: scrolls and medallions forming a diaper pattern, enclosing flowers and foliage. Printed in deep red flock, overprinted with red and black detailing, on a white satin ground with gray shadows.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Scrollwork enframing landscape with stag and mountains, printed in grisaille on gray ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Chinese scenic of the flowering tree and bird variety, painted on a light tan or yellowish ground. Brightly colored flowering tree runs horizontally up the center of the paper, while secondary flowering vines in gray run horizontally up either side.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Group of flattened bandbox fragments most of which are one-half the box side. A great variety of different scenes are included.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: One panel of a folding screen, featuring a figural landscape pattern with two soldiers: one mounting horse, the other resting against, printed in green; drapery swag border at top of panel, with narrow border at bottom.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Aesthetic style design with all-over pattern of leaves and branches laden with large seed-pods and small sprays of flowers; single-motif roughly diamond-shaped repeat in off-set columns; branches and seed-pods outlined in black while leaves and flowers are outlined in white; branches, leaves, and pods are a muted green and flowers a muted orange; ground is slightly lighter shade of green.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Notes
value: Aesthetic style design with all-over pattern of leaves and branches laden with large seed-pods and small sprays of flowers; single-motif roughly diamond-shaped repeat in off-set columns; branches and seed-pods outlined in black while leaves and flowers are outlined in white; branches, leaves, and pods are a muted green and flowers a muted orange; ground is slightly lighter shade of green.

label: Description
value: Two ornamental motifs, one large and one small, repeated one above the other; Larger motif is symmetrical pattern of narrow-necked vase holding bouquet of stylized tropical flowers supported on a floral arabesque design; smaller motif is a symmetrical stylized bellflower with stem and leaves; Pattern repeated in offset columns separated by vertical bands inset with repeated pattern of six-point stars; color scheme of gold on white.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Notes
value: Two ornamental motifs, one large and one small, repeated one above the other; Larger motif is symmetrical pattern of narrow-necked vase holding bouquet of stylized tropical flowers supported on a floral arabesque design; smaller motif is a symmetrical stylized bellflower with stem and leaves; Pattern repeated in offset columns separated by vertical bands inset with repeated pattern of six-point stars; color scheme of gold on white.

label: Description
value: Simple pattern of two abstract motifs, one large, one small, repeated in alteration horizontally and vertically; large amount of negative space between each motif; larger motif is vertically symmetrical and consists of stylized leaves growing out of a base composed of four flowers set in a square surrounded by two Greek- or Chinese-style frets; smaller motif composed of forms reminiscent of arrows or leaves arranged like a snowflake; pattern is embossed; color scheme of gold on white.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Notes
value: Simple pattern of two abstract motifs, one large, one small, repeated in alteration horizontally and vertically; large amount of negative space between each motif; larger motif is vertically symmetrical and consists of stylized leaves growing out of a base composed of four flowers set in a square surrounded by two Greek- or Chinese-style frets; smaller motif composed of forms reminiscent of arrows or leaves arranged like a snowflake; pattern is embossed; color scheme of gold on white.

label: Description
value: Aesthetic style design with dense all-over pattern consisting of foliage; single-motif roughly diamond-shaped repeat in off-set rows; several varieties of flowers and leaves; stylized with some suggestion of shading through hatching; color scheme is of a dark and muted yellow-gold on dark gray.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

value: Aesthetic style design with dense all-over pattern consisting of foliage; single-motif roughly diamond-shaped repeat in off-set rows; several varieties of flowers and leaves; stylized with some suggestion of shading through hatching; color scheme is of a dark and muted yellow-gold on dark gray.

label: Description
value: Dense Neo-Rococo pattern with two distinct roughly diamond-shaped motifs of flowers with stems and leaves repeated in interlocking vertical columns; Brown, bright blue, and pink flowers in many varieties; brown stems and leaves; ground is pale green; printed simulated tapestry weave texture.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Notes
value: Dense Neo-Rococo pattern with two distinct roughly diamond-shaped motifs of flowers with stems and leaves repeated in interlocking vertical columns; Brown, bright blue, and pink flowers in many varieties; brown stems and leaves; ground is pale green; printed simulated tapestry weave texture.

label: Description
value: Dense Neo-Rococo pattern consisting of a motif of fanciful flowers and grape-like bunches of fruit growing on long snake-like stem repeated vertically in off-set columns; dark color scheme of burgundy, greens, cream, muted pink, and white-dot highlighting on tan ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Notes
value: Dense Neo-Rococo pattern consisting of a motif of fanciful flowers and grape-like bunches of fruit growing on long snake-like stem repeated vertically in off-set columns; dark color scheme of burgundy, greens, cream, muted pink, and white-dot highlighting on tan ground.

label: Description
value: Pattern repeated in off-set vertical columns; two motifs repeated vertically; one a large bunch of foliage with two ears of wheat and a large flower; one a small stylized motif; vertical band between each column consisting of a repeated arrow-like symmetrical motif composed of abstract elements, highly stylized leaves, and cobweb; this motif somewhat reminiscent of Dresser in its treatment of leaves; color scheme of gray with metallic gold highlighting on pale grey ground.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Notes
value: Pattern repeated in off-set vertical columns; two motifs repeated vertically; one a large bunch of foliage with two ears of wheat and a large flower; one a small stylized motif; vertical band between each column consisting of a repeated arrow-like symmetrical motif composed of abstract elements, highly stylized leaves, and cobweb; this motif somewhat reminiscent of Dresser in its treatment of leaves; color scheme of gray with metallic gold highlighting on pale grey ground.

label: Description
value: Dense all-over pattern of branches laden with nuts (potentially stylized oak branches) rendered entirely in metallic gold outlining on a dark green or green-brown ground; pattern is made by a long vertical single-motif repeat that extends almost the entirety of the sample printed side-by-side.

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Jones and Erwin, Inc.

label: Description
value: Neoclassical pattern of columns of flower bouquets with roses and ears of wheat alternating with vertical ribbons with simple lace-like borders; vertical pattern in ribbon of songbirds alternating in three poses on entwined white wreaths; interiors of ribbons are grey with gold highlighting of birds and ribbon edges; flowers marked in white with some sprigs highlighted in gold; ground is light gray.
